com: edged and taken! Mohit has see-sawed this way and that with his length. This time a back of a good length delivery gets a little more bounce. Amla thought it was there to cut with the room on offer, but with the ball rising up higher, it takes the edge and settles in Dhoni's gloves. Mohit just looks relived. Kohli roars from mid-off. And Wankhede goes "Indiaaaaa.... India"

taken at long-off and Raina has broken through! Came down the track for a heave over the leg side, but he has not got close enough for the ball to hit against the turn. Gets a hug from his captain as he heads off to the pavilion a tired, but probably satisfied man.
this is a short ball, slower as well, Faf goes for the pull but cannot connect

Oh, the short ball gets him! And Wankhede stands up to salute him. "ABD, ABD, ABD" they cant as he raises his bat to them. The Indians come to congratulate him as well. Now for the small matter of the ball that did him - a slower short one that he tried to pull off the front foot. Feathered an edge to the keeper
a wicket off a short ball, Bhajji has one in the wicket column. Behardien went for the clear the front leg pull, but did not get the elevation. Caught at midwicket
how: c Raina b Harbhajan Singh 16 (11m 10b 0x4 2x6) SR: 160.00
